title: Workshop on Integrated Gamification Design for Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design and gamification concepts
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized training for in-service practitioners, implementing smartphone-based microlearning in environments without PC access.

learning_goals: Learners can design science education scenarios utilizing gamification elements (experience points, badges, leaderboards)
Learners can develop three or more microlearning gamification activities applicable in mobile environments
Learners can establish evaluation criteria for educational effectiveness (engagement, immersion, knowledge transfer) when designing gamification

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
